## 2025-12-03

### Changes

- Add app parameter in task object

### Requirements

| Name       | Version |
| ---------- | ------- |
| Gradle     | 8.7     |
| AGP        | 8.6     |
| Kotlin  | 2.1.21 |
| Min SDK    | 21      |
| Target SDK | 36      |
